properties.body:
STRAITS OF FLORIDA.
CUBA.
DNC 15.
24 FOOT VESSEL, WHITE HULL, TWO PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN VICINITY 23-22N 080-28W
AT 072230Z FEB. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC MIAMI,
PHONE: 305 415 6800,
E-MAIL: RCCMIAMI@USCG.MIL.
